A solar-powered snoring device that harnesses the energy of the sun to create a gentle and natural sound that helps individuals fall asleep faster and stay asleep longer.
A mobile app that tracks and analyzes snoring patterns, providing personalized recommendations for reducing snoring and improving sleep quality.
A smart snoring pillow that uses sensors and machine learning algorithms to adjust the firmness and shape of the pillow based on an individual's snoring patterns.
A smart snoring device that uses AI to identify and eliminate the root causes of snoring, such as nasal congestion or tongue obstruction.

A smart snoring mask that uses sensors and machine learning algorithms to adjust the pressure and fit of the mask based on an individual's snoring patterns, providing a more comfortable and effective solution for reducing snoring.
